job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Parker and Lynch is current seeking a Software Engineer in the Kansas City area to work within the Management Information Systems department and be responsible for carrying out software development projects that aid the goals of the company. This role cooperates within a team providing strong, scalable solutions across every department of a fast-growing and agile company. ResponsibilitiesDevelop and design customer-facing and internal applicationsDesign internal APIs and develop custom web servicesCollaborate with Business Analysts as well as other departments to obtain requirements for projects, execute test plans and supply required functionality.Maintain and migrate legacy software and applicationsIntegrate with third party systemsAnalyze root causes, debug code, and troubleshoot issues QualificationsBS in Computer Science or a related fieldAdept in at least one general purpose programming language: Ruby, Python, PHP, Perl, C#, or C++Experience using version control systems like Git and/or SubversionKnowledgeable with Linux and command-line interfaces like Bash and/or KornShellExperience using SQL  SkillsStrong troubleshooting and debugging skillsExcellent verbal, written and interpersonal communication skillsHighly detail orientedTeam player What helps you stand out:Experience with:CSS3 / HTML5Web Services (SOAP/REST)JavaScript (React/ES6/ES7/jQuery)AJAXOWASPTwelve-Factor Applications What's in it for you?Competitive compensation package401(k) company match and being 100% vested on your first dayGreat medical benefitsFlexible scheduleLocally owned with a fun and friendly atmosphereRecognized as one of the Best Places to Work in 2020 by Glassdoor  Employment TypeFull-timeEqual opportunity employer   If you have a strong desire to impact the success of a local organization please apply today!
